ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: those who honour their trusts and contracts;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And those who fulfil their trusts and covenants,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and those who fulfil their trusts and their covenants,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: who honor their trust and promises,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And those who protect the property entrusted to them, and their agreements.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And those who keep their trusts and covenants.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And those who are faithful to their trusts and their covenant
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and who preserve their trusts and their covenant,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And those who keep their pledges and their covenant,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and those who are faithful to their trusts and to their pledges;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And those who of their trusts and their covenant are keepers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and those who keep their trusts and covenants,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And those who respect their trusts and covenants;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And those who keep their trusts and covenants;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: (Those) who keep their trusts and their covenant,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And those who honor their trusts and their pledges.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And those who are to their trusts and promises attentive
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [70:32] and those who are keepers, [faithful] guardians, of their trusts (amānātihim: a variant reading has the singular [amānatihim]), that to which they are entrusted of religion and the affairs of this world, and their covenant, the one taken from them regarding such things,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And those who keep) and those who honour, and keep to the time agreed upon regarding (their pledges) that with which they have been entrusted whether it relates to religion or other things (and their covenant) with their Lord or with other people; and it is also said this means: and their oaths.
